display_long_description:
Step into a world of fear with Ape Nightmares, a Gorilla Tag-inspired horror game designed for adrenaline junkies. Utilizing Gorilla Tag’s unique locomotion system, you’ll run, jump, and climb through terrifying environments as you try to escape relentless horrors. The game challenges your reflexes and courage, pitting you against eerie creatures in an immersive, nightmarish setting.

Prepare for jumpscares, intense chases, and an atmosphere thick with tension. This isn’t just a game—it’s an experience that will keep you on edge from start to finish. Whether you’re alone or with friends, every moment is a test of your survival instincts. If you’re a fan of Gorilla Tag and love horror, Ape Nightmares is a must-play.

Warning: Ape Nightmares is not for the faint of heart. If you’re easily scared or don’t enjoy horror games, this experience may not be for you. Players must be 13 years or older.
